divs: sighting detailsi dont care if any one knows where i was at the time i was doing time in enfield ct after lights out at 1130pm we were jokeing around when a bought 10 min later the dorm lit up the lights were on but we realized they were coming from out side an we were on the top flor of a 2 story dorm we were on a good size hill over looking the ct valey an during the day we could see the foot hills some 20 miles away and those lights were coming from just over the mt tops an was coming at us it took a bought 5min before we under stood that it wasent a plain as it came closer we saw the out line as it rose up to pass over us it was verry large an thick i mean it passed over the dorm only 30ft a bove us as it passed over we started to run to the other side the air an the dorm felt very strang like we were moving in slow mo we got to the other side an could the back of it it had 2 very big yellow squsre lights in the back just after it pased a bought 70 yards the dorm started to shake an a loud noise an we saw 2 jets flying very slow as the jets passed the jet on the right shot sparks from undre the left wing at the thing an at that time the thing just left in a blink of an eye the thing made no sound an was biger than 3 foot ball fields wide an at lease 100yds long an a bought 100ft thick an we could see the under side it looked like it had all sorts of stuff on it like a ship on tv show the funny part no one rememberd the next day i started to rember back in 1996 or 97 when the news reported lights in the sky over airzona then i started having all sorts of re membering a bought that night an then i remember when i was a child in 1968 with my father we saw the same thing to this day i can draw in to a tee an i cant draw i cant get it out of my mind beleave it or not i cant stop beleaveing it my spelling is bad but not me thank you for your time *(wit's name and posible identifying info removed--cms\sg).
Summary: lights lit uo the dorm from aprx 20 miles a way coming at us at abouhgt 40 mph o so
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Enfield
There were no other sightings in Enfield on or around February 29th 1988
